sentences.en: But as one breed of hitchhiker vanished into folk legend, another kind has appeared.
sentences.cn: 不过,一种便车族变成民间传奇走入历史, 另一种便车族应运而生.

sentences.en: Gucci: I've heard Hitchhiker would be on next week. I want to see it.
sentences.cn: 古奇: 我听说《搭车人》将会在下周上映. 我想去看.

sentences.en: He picked up two hitchhiker s at the entrance to the motorway.
sentences.cn: 在高速公路入口,他让两个免费搭车旅行者搭了他的车.

sentences.en: It was then that he noticed the hitchhiker by the road.
sentences.cn: 就在那时他注意到马路边有个搭便车者.

sentences.en: That hitchhiker looks dangerous. Don't pick him up.
sentences.cn: 那个搭便车的人看起来很危险. 不要载他.

sentences.en: The Hitch Hiker's Guide to the Galaxy also mentions alcohol.
sentences.cn: HitchHiker的《银河系漫游指南》中也提到了酒.

sentences.en: The hitchhiker came into town looking for trouble.
sentences.cn: 那个搭顺风车旅行的人来镇上自找麻烦.

words.tran_cn: 被钩住；急动；蹒跚；搭便车旅行；结婚
搭便车；钩住；套住；猛拉；使结婚

trans.tran_cn: 搭便车的旅行者，顺便插入的广告，短篇广告
